Title: Senior Product Owner (m/f/d)
job_Description:
Forte Digital builds relevant digital products for our clients by combining the power of data, technology, and design. We create meaningful experiences and deliver value across the entire customer journey all while working in joint interdisciplinary teams with our clients. As Forte Digital Germanys Senior Product Owner you will manage the product roadmap, advise our clients and guide your team to deliver excellent digital solutions in time and budget.




You should be based in Berlin to join our Forte Team in Germany.




Requirements




Responsibilities:




Advising our clients, developing ideas and initiatives for their digital growth based on your up-to-date knowledge about innovative technologies (apps, software, AI, chatbots, big data etc.)
Managing the client communication in every workstream of the business model and product development through agile coaching
Owning the product roadmap and ensuring connected prioritization
Translating client requirements into work packages and ensure goals and objectives are well understood by all team members
Conduct tests for the developed hypotheses
Organize and run workshops with all stakeholders
By using agile methods, you plan sprints, create, maintain and prioritize backlogs in Confluence & Jira, plan reviews, deadlines and retrospective
Oversee the development and the sprint cycles, evaluating progress at every stage
Enabling a culture of high performance and service delivery, including exemplary cross-team working and effective communication
Maintain an up-to-date understanding of the market, analyze user figures and competitors




Required Skills:




Experience working with Scrum teams and the application of Agile techniques and practices
Excellent communication skills with the ability to engage, influence, and inspire colleagues and stakeholders to drive collaboration and alignment
High level of management skills and experience working in high-performing and fast-paced environments
Ability to generate relationships with confidence, respect, empathy and trust
Extensive technical understanding within decoupled software architecture (headless CMS and REACT frontends) and substantial experience working with DXP platforms and eCommerce architectures
Experience working with Confluence, Jira & Jira Service Desk, or Azure DevOps




Education and Experience:




At least 5 years working experience in a Product Owner (for web applications and/or intranet solutions) or Product Manager role
University Degree in computer science, IT, business or a related field
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in German and English
Nice to have: You gained a certificate as Product Owner, in Agile Methods or related additional trainings




Benefits




Future-focused consulting company




You‚Äôll be a part of an international digital consulting company, and a team of highly skilled people with a common desire to create the workplace of our dreams. We are achieving our goal of creating the best digital solutions and long-term value for our customers by utilising deep knowledge, autonomy, openness, generosity and cooperation.




Team spirit




You‚Äôll be part of a great team! We want all our colleagues to have a voice and we make decisions as a team. As one of our colleagues, you will be part of a future focused growth, design, technology and consulting organization with an open and flat structure, where people, knowledge and creating the best solutions for our clients are in the driving seat




Expertise




You‚Äôll meet a lot of passionate people who love to share and to learn from each other. We have several processes in place that ensure continuous and regular exchange between all knowledge hubs.




Lived pragmatism




We are solution-oriented and pragmatic in our approach, with regard to both our methods and each other as well as in our collaboration with clients. Among the 350 Forte Digital employees in Scandinavia and Poland, we are a hub of over 30 specialists. Big enough to handle complex projects and small enough to be there for our customers quickly and non-bureaucratically




Stable client portfolio




We work with ambitious but stable clients that are looking for long-term engagements.




Development




The opportunity to develop personally and professionally in different competency classes or in our Forte Academy but also in an agile team, which lives an open error and feedback culture and promotes, among other things, training and education of the Scrum Alliance




Inspiring work life




The doors of our office in Berlin Kreuzberg are always open for you and our other hubs are happy to welcome you abroad as well. Additionally, you have the option of a 4-day work week.




International environment




Enjoy the international environment with offices in Oslo, Krakow, Berlin and Copenhagen and clients from all over Europe.




Vacation days




At Forte Digital, we offer 30 vacation days.




Gym membership




We'll support your Urban Sports Club membership.




Wide range of social activities




Participation in social activities like trips, dinners and activities like golf, rock climbing, football and squash




Social responsibility




We encourage our employees to decide which charitable projects our company invests in and which causes we can support.




Holiday resort in the South of France




A very nice property in France at the disposal of all employees either for workation or vacation purposes (yes, even with a nice pool)!
